item.description:
Don't feel like going into Boston on New Years.

Come enjoy a good time with food and bowling at Kings in Dedham.  Will have dinner and then enjoy bowling and socializing after.

For New Years Kings is offering either their standard dinner menu or a special 4-Course Prix Fixe Menu for just $48 Per Person!  4-Course Prix Fixe Menu includes a 4 course dinner (with either lobster or prime rib) and a champagne toast

If not up for dinner you could just join in on the bowling at around 9:30

Will schedule this with a few meetup groups as the more the better.

As the attendance will be limited please make sure that you are 99% certain you can attend when you say yes.  If you have 3 or more no-shows with the group you may be excluded from attending this event.
item.how_to_find_us: Will meet by the hostess station
item.name: New Years Eve Dinner and Bowling in Dedham
